copy and paste all files in kuban to my docs 18 wheels. delete russian.scs in 18 wheels in program files, also delete scripts in my docs 18 wheels. was only way i could get the english, but still have all road signs and maps in russian. took me ages to suss this out but very playable now except on screen map dont move when you go to the far right of map. hope this helps.
